  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120811</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120811</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uporaba uklonske mrežice</string>
            <string language="en">Application of Diffraction Gratings</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendung der optischer Raster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Application des réseaux de diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aplicação de gratings de diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Applicazione dei reticoli di diffrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμογή των κιγκλιδωμάτων διάθλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicación de las rejillas de difracción</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv valovne dolžine svetlobe na kot uklona pri uklonski mrežici.</string>
            <string language="en">The effect of light wavelength on the angle of diffraction when diffraction grating is used.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uklonska mrežica</string>
            <string language="en">diffraction grating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uklon</string>
            <string language="en">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt der hellen Wellenlänge auf dem Winkel
der Beugung, wenn optisches Raster benutzt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de la longueur d'onde légère sur 
l'angle de la diffraction quand le réseau de diffraction est 
utilisé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito do wavelength claro no ângulo do 
diffraction quando o grating de diffraction for usado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della lunghezza d'onda chiara 
sull'angolo di diffrazione quando il reticolo di diffrazione è usato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση του ελαφριού μήκους κύματος στη γωνία της 
διάθλασης όταν χρησιμοποιείται το κιγκλίδωμα διάθλασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la longitud de onda ligera en el 
ángulo de la difracción cuando se utiliza la rejilla de difracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optisches Raster</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réseau de diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">grating de diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reticolo di diffrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diffrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κιγκλίδωμα διάθλασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rejilla de difracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">difracción</string>
          </keyword>
